StringTable.Label: AncientRuins_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]These Precursor ruins are renown throughout the galaxy.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: AncientWonder_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]This ancient wonder appears to have been made by the Precursors.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Auroras_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Auroras fill the sky here and captivate all who see it.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Cataract_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Massive falls provide almost free energy for manufacturing.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FluorescentForest_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]The beauty of this forest would be enjoyed by citizens or tourists.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GeothermalSprings_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]These springs power manufacturing plants, and heated pools.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GiantMushrooms_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]These freakishly large mushrooms present a generous food source.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GoldFields_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Fields rich with precious gold, will enrich whoever mines it.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Haven_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]This idyllic region is so beautiful that living here makes people happy.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ImpactCrater_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Studying this site could reveal insight about the history of this world.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: IsolatedBiome_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]The unique flora and fauna of this region will benefit research.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: MineralRich_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]The minerals found here are extremely useful for construction.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: NaturalWonder_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Attractions built here will draw tourists from the furthest reaches of the galaxy.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_Oasis_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]A particularly fertile area in an otherwise inhospitable land.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Paradise_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]This is where everyone wants to live, or at least visit once in their life.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PermanentRainbow_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]The beautiful rainbow improves the mood of the local populace.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Planetfall_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]The reported location of the original scouts to set foot on this world.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PreciousMetals_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Veins of precious metals make this an ideal spot to make some profit.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: RareEarth_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Rare earth metals allow for much more exotic research methods.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: RareStones_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Rare gems found in this location are valuable throughout the galaxy.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: RestorativeHerbs_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]The restorative power of these herbs can be used for medical treatments.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_Floodplain_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]These nutrient rich flood plains are perfect for growing food.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_Forest_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Forests provide raw material that can be useful to manufacturing.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_FrozenLakes_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]The ice traps ages of scientific data and creates beautiful vistas to relax by.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_Jungle_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]These thick jungles hide a wealth of resources.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_Grassland_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]These fertile fields are an ideal place for homes.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_Lakes_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Lakes are a fantastic place to attract the best scientists to work.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_Mountains_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]The isolation of mountains make them excellent for cultural improvements.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_Ravine_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]The stunning views of this region provide easy access to minerals.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_Tundra_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Clear, isolated regions are good for Research.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_VolcanicRifts_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Heat from below the surface can be extracted to power production.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_Volcano_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]A good place to build a sinister hideout or stronghold.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_VolcanicPlains_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]A surprisingly useful place for conducting sinister research.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_Lavaflow_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Flowing lava is in this area making it not terribly useful for anything.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_Wasteland_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Barely usable terrain. There must be better options.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_Wetland_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]It is difficult to use heavy equipment here, but the climate is ideal.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ThrivingReef_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]This reef is home to many exotic creatures that we can study.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: UndergroundRelics_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Our traders are eager to get their hands on these precious relics.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: UnstableMaterials_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Undiscovered materials that could be deadly if weaponized.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: VaporMines_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]These mines can be extracted to provide a significant economic bonus.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Lagoon_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]A serene expanse of shallow waters, encircled by lush foliage. [/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Shallows_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]A stretch of clear, shallow waters, gently lapping over fine sands.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Coastal_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Stunning shoreline where the land meets the sea. [/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_FertilePlains_Dec
StringTable.String: Spanning vast expanses, these lands are the heartland of agriculture.

StringTable.Label: Terrain_TropicalGrassland_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Characterized by tall grasses and scattered trees.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_StonyPlains_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Rugged landscape, with rocky surfaces and sparse vegetation.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: TerrainTile_Highlands_Dec
StringTable.String: Rolling hills and elevated landforms dominate these lands.

StringTable.Label: Terrain_Steppes_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Expansive grasslands characterized by their semi-arid climate.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_FertileValley_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Nestled between mountains, these lush valleys boast rich soil.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_Plateau_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Flat-topped areas rising sharply above the landscape are strategic.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Terrain_Shrublands_Dec
StringTable.String: [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Dominated by dense shrubs and hardy plants.[/COLOR]
